query:
-- Create Super Admin user
INSERT INTO users (username, email, name, role, password_hash, is_active, created_at)
VALUES (
  'Echofort$Super$Admin',
  'EchofortAI@gmail.com',
  'Vigneshwaran J',
  'super_admin',
  '$2b$10$YourHashedPasswordHere', -- This will be replaced by actual bcrypt hash
  true,
  NOW()
)
ON CONFLICT (email) DO UPDATE SET
  username = EXCLUDED.username,
  name = EXCLUDED.name,
  role = EXCLUDED.role
RETURNING id, username, email, role;
